ActorFrame.OnCommand: %function(self) local children = self:GetChildren() math.randomseed(math.random() * 1000000 + Second() * Hour() * DayOfYear()) local fail = math.random(1, 60) local actor = children[1] if OatProfile().OATResultGif == 1 then actor:Load(Path('Graphics', '_grade models/f.gif')) actor:zoom(0.5) elseif OatProfile().OATResultGif == 3 then actor:Load(Path('Graphics', '_grade models/f.png')) actor:zoom(0.5) else actor:Load(Path('Graphics', '_grade models/fail/fail' .. fail)) actor:stretchto(-25, -25, 50, 50) end end
